instructions.da: Drej til svagt højresving mof Destination 1
instructions.es: Gira a levemente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Al final de la calle gira ligeramente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à droite en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Belok agak ke kanan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Gira a destra leggermente verso Destination 1
instructions.my: Destination 1ဆီသို႕ ညာဘက္ အနည္းငယ္ကို လွည္႕ပါ
instructions.pl: Skręć łagodnie w prawo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Vire suave à direita sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Vire ligeiramente à direita em direção a Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametinde hafif sağ yöne dön
instructions.uk: Поверніть плавно праворуч у напрямку Destination 1
